title: Easy to use when it's not crashing!
comment: Doesn't bury the basic functions under useless extras. Good app if you want to quickly start playing an album/folder of songs, but it crashes a lot

title: Good progress, but...
comment: 1- Does not find servers available via the tun0 interface(e.g. VPN). 2- There is an off-by-one bug. If you tap on an item in the playlist, the next one will play! 3- It would be useful if the current directory is shown somewhere.
1 - I'll try and reproduce/fix that. 2 - That definitely does not happen for me, need more info. 3. Sure, where?

title: Fantastic
comment: Working great on a nexus 7 and nexus 4,well done Dev!

Thanks :)

I'd love it if you could send me some screenshots for the Play Store (via mail). And feel free to suggest any layout changes.
Never showed any of my upnp servers and crashed when I tried to view renderers. galaxy s4 running cyanogenmod 11. Bubbleupnp works correctly on same device.

Could you please report the crash? (there should be a dialog for that)

You probably have a device I haven't tested with.
